import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { NewAppContext } from "../../App"; import useAuth from "../../hooks/useAuth"; export default function UserList() { const { depositInfo, setDepositInfo } = useContext(NewAppContext); const [depositInfo2, setDepositInfo2] = useState([]); const { userInfo } = useAuth(); useEffect(() => { //https://dmf-server.vercel.app/ fetch(`https://dmf-server.vercel.app/users`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { const latestData = data.sort( (a, b) => new Date(b.date).getTime() - new Date(a.date).getTime() ); setDepositInfo(latestData); setDepositInfo2(latestData); }); }, []); // searching method const handleSearch = (event) => { const searchText = event.target.value; if (searchText) { const matchedDetails = depositInfo.filter( (details) => details.dmfID.includes(searchText) || details.transactionID.includes(searchText) ); setDepositInfo(matchedDetails); } else { setDepositInfo(depositInfo2); } }; return (

DMF Interest Free Loan Scheme (User List)

{depositInfo.slice(0, 10)?.map((data, index) => ( ))}
Name
DMF ID
Amount
Transaction ID
Date
Payment Method
Status
{data?.displayName}
{data?.dmfID}
à§³ {data?.depositAmount}
{data?.transactionID}
{data?.date.slice(0, 10)}
{data?.paymentType}
{data?.status}
); }
